testCases.name: All Storage Accounts should have HTTPS-only enabled
testCases.description: All Storage Accounts should have HTTPS-only enabled
All Storage Accounts should have minimum TLS 1.2

testCases.name: All Storage Accounts should have Blob Public Access disabled
testCases.description: All Storage Accounts should have Blob Public Access disabled

testCases.name: All Key Vaults should have Soft Delete enabled
testCases.description: All Key Vaults should have Soft Delete enabled

testCases.name: All Key Vaults should have Purge Protection enabled in Production
testCases.description: All Key Vaults should have Purge Protection enabled in Production

testCases.name: All Web Apps should have HTTPS-only enabled
testCases.description: All Web Apps should have HTTPS-only enabled
All Web Apps should use minimum TLS 1.2

testCases.name: All SQL Servers should have Azure AD authentication enabled
testCases.description: All SQL Servers should have Azure AD authentication enabled

testCases.description: All SQL Servers should have Auditing enabled
